document.full_text: the main supply route for nato troops in afghanistan was temporarily closed on sunday after thousands of people blocked a key highway in pakistan to protest against u.s. drone strikes, officials said.
document.title: pakistanis rally against drone strikes, block nato supply route
lines_and_colors: the main supply route for nato troops in afghanistan was temporarily closed on sunday after thousands of people blocked a key highway in pakistan to protest against u.s. drone strikes, officials said.
